errorPreloadEligibility.description: Report message when there is an error getting the preload eligibility
errorPreloadEligibility.message: Error with getting preload eligibility for $1.

errorPreloadStatus.description: Report message when there is an error getting the preload status
errorPreloadStatus.message: Error with getting preload status for $1.

moreThanOneName.description: Report message when a 'strict-transport-security' header has more than one 'name'

noHeader.description: Report message when the 'strict-transport-security' header was not specified

noOverHTTP.description: Report message when the 'strict-transport-security' header is served over HTTP
noOverHTTP.message: 'strict-transport-security' header should't be specified in pages served over HTTP.

requiresMaxAge.description: Report message when the 'strict-transport-security' header doesn't contain the required 'max-age' directive

wrongFormat.description: Report message when a 'strict-transport-security' header has a wrong format

wrongMaxAge.description: Report message when the 'strict-transport-security' header has a value for 'max-age' under the minimum value
wrongMaxAge.message: 'strict-transport-security' header 'max-age' value should be more than $1

wrongVerification.description: Report message when there is an error getting the preload status
wrongVerification.message: $1 There might be something wrong with the verification endpoint.
